{{main|Wizards}}
'''Istar''' (pl. '''''Istari''''') A [[Quenya]] word meaning approximately "''Wise One''", translated as "''[[wizards|Wizard]]''",<ref name=UT>{{UT|Istari}}</ref> or "those who know".<ref name=L156>{{L|156}}</ref>

== Etymology ==
The word comes from the verb ''[[ista-]]'' ("to know"), and possibly the [[Wikipedia:Agentive ending|agentive ending]] ''[[-ro]]''.<ref>[[Helge Fauskanger]], "[http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/affix~1.htm Quenya Affixes]" at [http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/ Ardalambion] (accessed 15 December 2011)</ref>

== Other forms ==
*''Istarion'': "of Wizards"<ref name=UT/> ([[Wikipedia:Genitive case|genitive plural]])<ref>[[Helge Fauskanger]], "[http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/eng-quen.rtf English-Quenya Wordlist (Quettaparma Quenyanna)]" at [http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/ Ardalambion] (accessed 25 June 2011)</ref>

== Cognates ==
* [[Sindarin]] ''[[ithron]]''<ref name=UT/>

== Examples ==
* ''[[Order of Wizards|Heren Istarion]]''<ref name=UT/>
* '''Istar''', the original, discarded, name of [[Tar-Míriel]]
